price: 84. Il est Celui Qui est Dieu dans le ciel et Dieu sur terre, et Il est le Sage, l’Omniscient.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِلَٰهٞ وَفِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَٰهٞۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī fī al-samāi ilāhun wafī al-arḍi ilāhun wahuwa al-ḥakīmu al-ʿalīmu
